p: Ethyl 1-((1H-imidazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylate (43). Purification using methanol/dichloromethane (1:99 → 5:95) afforded the product as a brown oil in 64% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3) δ 7.34 (ddd, J = 14.6, 7.7, 6.2 Hz, 3H), 7.25 − 7.16 (m, 3H), 6.93 (s, 1H), 6.73 (s, 1H), 4.34 (dd, J = 14.9, 0.6 Hz, 1H), 4.21 (qd, J = 7.1, 2.7 Hz, 2H), 3.45 (d, J = 14.9 Hz, 1H), 3.13 − 3.01 (m, 1H), 1.82 (ddd, J = 9.2, 5.3, 1.0 Hz, 1H), 1.50 (dd, J = 7.4, 5.4 Hz, 1H), 1.28 (t, J = 7.1 Hz, 3H).
